name: RPG Maker MZ Project
summary: Learn about .RMMZPROJECT files and view a list of programs that open them.
developer: Gotcha Gotcha Games, KADOKAWA, Yoji Ojima

content: RPG Maker is a series of PC-based RPG creation tools that allow gamers to design, play, and distribute their own RPGs. RPG Maker MZ is the ninth entry in the series; it was released in 2020.

Different versions of RPG Maker save project files in different file formats. RPG Maker MZ saves project files as RMMZPROJECT files. Each RMMZPROJECT file contains information that allows RPG Maker MZ to load that game creation project and its included assets, such as maps, sprites, sounds, and game logic.
RPG Maker MZ typically saves RMMZPROJECT files in a directory created specifically to hold a game creation project and its assets. In Windows, these directories are located at:

instructions: You can open an RMMZPROJECT file with RPG Maker MZ (Windows, Mac). To do so, select File → Open Project... from the program's menu bar. Then, navigate to and open your RMMZPROJECT file.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
